(Yo, Wolfgang, waiting for Rainchark's response)

Shockwave/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/
Sun Crusher/Reflector:



Sixshot slowly looked to Ares.  "Send a message to Shockwave and report this 
intruder." he said as he waited for the unknown robot (Rainchark) to make a 
response.

Ares nodded while keeping his laser weapon still trained on Rainchark's face 
and activated his comm. systems. 
"Shockwave, we have found an intruder outside of the base, he doesn't appear 
to be dangerous for now, Sixshot and I have things under control."

---
Shockwave sat up at the message from Ares and made a quick response in his 
somewhat monotonous voice.  "Find out what he wants and who he's with.  
Report back immediately if anything occurs."

After an acknowledgement from Ares, Shockwave activated a comm. link with 
Firestarter.  "Firestarter, go to the bridge and have defenses ready, there 
is an intruder and more may be on the way."

Shockwave walked out of his quarters and headed for the bridge of the Ramora.

---

Double Punch, Manterror, and Injector were all out of the repair bay and 
headed for the bridge, not sure of the situation in the hierarchy.

---

Sun Crusher ducked a slash and with a roundhouse kick knocked Reflector to 
his back and then with a slash downward his blade stabbed into the other 
Brotherhood member's chest and it was over.

The hologram program ended and Sun Crusher helped the undamaged Reflector up. 
 "That was interesting?  Care to try again?"

"Yes, this time let's be on the same team."
